lines.text: What do I like about you?
You want me to tell you? Or show you?
Okay, so where do you wanna go?
You know something, Hank? You're ninety per-cent man and ten per-cent rat.
Anytime you want the ninety per-cent, just reach.
You're different from when you were on the beach.
I'm no different. I just changed beaches.
Tell me something. Is there anything you wouldn't do for a buck?
There must be something but I have yet to find it.
Hank, honey, y'all want to help me with my crawl stroke again?
Tell you what, baby. You go ahead and get wet. If I'm not there in five minutes, you start without me.
We've got a helluva fraternity. Our members have washed up on beaches all over the world, and all of us are the same.
No, some of us are different. Some of us are worse.
